'''Deadly Ascent''' is a [[Badges|badge]] that can be obtained by playing on the island of [[Twins of Nerechtemeresch]].

Objective: <big style="color:yellow">Kill all guards on the island in ascending order. Guards on the same height level have to be killed before ascending to a higher level.</big>
